name: Prime Shooter
description:
Controls:

Move: A/D or Left/Right arrows

Shoot: Space or Left control

Change weapon/number: 2,3,5,7 or GHJK

How to play:

Your goal is to shoot down the falling number blocks by shooting them with the appropriate prime factors. So if there is a block with 12 on it, then you shoot it with 2 twice and then switch to 3 weapon and shoot again. Beacuse 2*2*3=12. You can move from side to side to "aim".

You have 3 lifes so if 3 blocks gets to the bottom you loose. Try getting the highest score you can.

Info:

This game was made during the game jam Mix And Game Jam 2020, with the theme Mix 2 game genres. This game is then a mix between a classic arcade shooter and an educational math game.

All the sprites (- the hearts which are from Kenney) are made by me during the game jam. Primarily using Assetforge and/or Photoshop. The font used is "built titling".

The music is Factory by Evan King. The sound effects are made in bfxr during the jam.
